subTitle: Build log analytics pipelines on Amazon OpenSearch
subDesc: Log Hub is an AWS Solution that simplifies the build of log analytics pipelines, including log ingestion, log processing and log visualization.

benefits.title: Benefits and features
benefits.consoleDesc: Create and manage your log analytics pipelines with a few simple clicks on the Lob Hub console.
benefits.ingestionDesc: Ingest both AWS service logs and application logs into Amazon OpenSearch in a single web console.
benefits.codelessDesc: Cleanup and enrich the log data without writing code via AWS-developed or AWS-verified log processor plugins.
benefits.insightDesc: Bootstrap the creation of Kibana dashboards to generate insights through a collection of built-in Kibana templates for AWS services and commonly-used software, e.g. Nginx, Apache HTTP Server.

useCase.title: Use cases
useCase.troubleDesc: Ingest both AWS service logs and your application logs into Amazon OpenSearch. Understand what went wrong and why, then fix quickly.
useCase.complianceDesc: Store your log data to meet audit requirements. Enable your workload to comply with required policies, such as MLPS, GDPR.

getStarted.title: Get started
getStarted.domainDesc: Import Amazon OpenSearch domain into Log Hub
getStarted.pipelineDesc: Create log analytics pipeline for AWS Service
getStarted.appPipelineDesc: Create log analytics pipeline for Application
